thread.section_title: Event Decor Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Event Decor Direct | eventdecordirect.com
thread.title: Kathy Cooper
thread.title_full: Event Decor Direct reviewed by Kathy Cooper

author: Kathy Cooper
title: Kathy Cooper
text: I recently placed an order with Event Décor. However, I did not think the order went through; so I tried placing it again. Ending up with two orders of the same item. Event Décor contacted me through email and by phone to correct my mistake. Extremely courteous and helpful. Great Team!
